definitions.definition: a person who is one of the first people to do something:
examples: one of the pioneers of modern science

definitions.definition: a person who goes to an area and builds a house, begins a farm, etc.:
examples: The pioneers went west across North America, cutting down forests and planting new crops.

definitions.definition: to be one of the first people to do something:
examples: It was universities that pioneered these new industries.
